zoom-around-cursor.name: Zoom around cursor
zoom-around-cursor.hint: Center zooming around cursor. Does not apply to zooming with pageup or pagedown.

middle-mouse-pan.name: Middle-mouse to pan
middle-mouse-pan.hint: Middle mouse press will pan the canvas, instead of the default of doing nothing.

max-zoom-override.name: Maximum zoom override
max-zoom-override.hint: Override for the maximum zoom scale limit. 3 is the Foundry default (up to x3 scaling).

min-zoom-override.name: Minimum zoom override
min-zoom-override.hint: Override for the minimum zoom scale limit. 0.333 is the Foundry default (down to x0.333 scaling).

drag-resistance-mode.name: Drag resistance mode
drag-resistance-mode.hint: By default, Foundry has a "drag resistance" of 0.25 grid units (so usually ~25).' This is the minimum distance you need to move your cursor for a mouse drag event to be triggered. When it's too high you'll feel a dead zone when making small mouse drags (e.g. short pans, small drawings). Recommended setting: "Scaling", which scales to be a bit less than the visual size of a tool button.
drag-resistance-mode.choice_foundry: Foundry Default: ~25 constantly, can feel bad, particularly when zoomed in
drag-resistance-mode.choice_responsive: Responsive: 0.1 constantly, makes it hard to ping (long press)
drag-resistance-mode.choice_scaling: Scaling: scales to always be about 1% of screen width

pan-zoom-mode.name: Pan/zoom mode
pan-zoom-mode.hint:
Mouse: Standard foundry behavior. Zoom with mouse scroll. Rotate with Shift+scroll and Ctrl+scroll.
||
Touchpad: Pan with two-finger drag. Zoom with two-finger pinch or Ctrl+scroll. Rotate with Shift+scroll and Ctrl+Shift+scroll.
||
Alternative: Pan with two-finger drag or scroll or shift+scroll. Zoom with two-finger pinch or Ctrl+scroll. Rotate with Alt+Shift+scroll and Alt+Ctrl+scroll.
pan-zoom-mode.choice_touchpad: Touchpad: drag, pinch, rotate with Shift or Ctrl+Shift
pan-zoom-mode.choice_alternative: Alternative: can pan with Shift, rotate while holding Alt

auto-detect-touchpad.name: Auto-detect touchpad (BUGGY)
auto-detect-touchpad.hint: Will try to auto-detect touchpads;  going with either Mouse or Touchpad depending on result (or Alternative if it was selected).  This feature is buggy and doesn't work for everyone!

zoom-speed-multiplier.name: Zoom speed
zoom-speed-multiplier.hint: Multiplies zoom speed, affecting scaling speed. 0.1 or 10 might be better for some touchpads. 0 for default Foundry behavior (which ignores scroll "intensity", and feels worse for touchpads).

pan-speed-multiplier.name: Pan speed (for touchpad mode)
pan-speed-multiplier.hint: Multiplies pan speed if you're using touchpad/alternative mode. Defaults to 1, which should be close to the pan speed when right-click-dragging the canvas.

invert-vertical-scroll.name: Invert vertical scroll
invert-vertical-scroll.hint: If set to true, you will scroll up when dragging/scrolling down.

pad-value-when-dragging.name: "pad" value when dragging something to the edge of the screen
pad-value-when-dragging.hint: When holding down the cursor and moving it towards the edge of the screen, the canvas will pan.  "pad" is the distance that will trigger it. Foundry default is 50px.

shift-value-when-dragging.name: "shift" value when dragging something to the edge of the screen
shift-value-when-dragging.hint: When holding down the cursor and moving it towards the edge of the screen, the canvas will pan.  "shift" is the panning distance in tiles. Foundry default is 3 tiles.

scene-field-group-label.name: Scene Zoom Overrides
scene-field-group-label.hint: Set override values for min/max zoom on this scene.  delete to reset to default behavior.
